ComicInfo.Summary:
In Un/Sacred Vol 2, Mirka and her special guests invite you once again into the world of Angelina and Damiao…and their daughter Eden!
In issue 5, “Deliver Us From Evil,” Eden is all grown up, and starting to date! But her choice of boyfriend, Severino—the spoiled brat who taunted Damiano growing up all his life—is something that Damiano is finding VERY hard to swallow, as a protective father.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A (Eden & Severino) | Mirka Andolfo | 1 | B | Cover B (Cleavage Dive) | Mirka Andolfo | 2 | C | Cover C | The Pander Brothers | 3 | D | Cover D | Elise Pocetta | 4 | E | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Virgin Cover E | Mirka Andolfo | 5 | F | 1:20 Retailer Incentive Black & White Virgin Cover F | Mirka Andolfo | 6 | G | 1:30 Retailer Incentive Negative Art Cover G | Mirka Andolfo | 7 |
